#summary How to get started with Swarm

= Notes =
These instructions assume you are using a Linux or Mac-like system.  If you are using Windows, we recommending using [http://www.cygwin.com/ Cygwin] which should allow you to follow these instructions more-or-less verbatim.


= Install sbt launcher =

http://code.google.com/p/simple-build-tool/wiki/Setup

= Run the demo =

From the Swarm directory, in one console window:
{{{
sbt update package "demo Listen 9997"
}}}
Then, in another console window:
{{{
sbt "demo ExplicitMoveTo1 9998 start"
}}}
